name: Zomby
description:
A Word From The Author

The following game is made for Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3 with the theme "less is more". This game is made in 1 week. No external assets or prewritten scripts are used in this game.

  • Producer: Zeno
  • Game Engine: Unity
  • Sprite Editor: Piskel
  • Music Maker: Bosca Ceoil (Coeil? idk), Bfxr
  • Font: Patrick Hand
